recipes.name: Classic Margherita Pizza
instructions: Preheat the oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out the pizza dough and spread tomato sauce evenly.
Top with slices of fresh mozzarella and fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Bake in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes or until the crust is golden brown.
Slice and serve hot.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a pan, sauté pancetta until crispy. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan in a bowl.
Drain spaghetti and add to the pan with pancetta.
Remove from heat and quickly stir in the egg mixture.
Season with salt and pepper and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
instructions: Chop romaine lettuce and place in a large bowl.
Add sliced grilled chicken, croutons, and grated Parmesan cheese.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing and toss to combine.
Squeeze lemon juice over the salad for extra flavor.
Serve chilled.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook ground beef in a skillet until browned.
Add taco seasoning and water, simmer for 5 minutes.
Warm taco shells in the oven.
Fill shells with beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese, and sour cream.
Serve hot with extra toppings if desired.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
Cream together the butter, brown sugar, and white sugar.
Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla.
Dissolve baking soda in hot water and add to the batter with salt.
Stir in flour and chocolate chips.
Drop by large spoonfuls onto ungreased pans.
Bake for 10 minutes or until edges are nicely browned.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 1 minute.
Add broccoli, bell peppers, carrots, and snow peas.
Stir-fry vegetables until tender-crisp.
Add soy sauce and toss to coat.
Serve hot over rice or noodles.
